overview: Fans have asked to see more bloopers and behind-the-scenes footage from Bill Zebubâ€™s comedies.  It is NOT presented as a documentary. If every little bit has an introduction or an explanation, that would be time taken away from the desired footage. A short message begins the collection, and viewers can take it or leave it.
tagline: For EXTREME Fans of Bill Zebub's Films
title: B Movie Champion
